channel.title: Help: Need detailed explanation of how to start a server
channel.description:
Ok, I have my source, extracted to a folder onto my desktop. I have the compile.bat edited properly. Now I need to know whats next? When I click Runserver it says: Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
Thats what it stays as. I need to know in detail, how to find my ip. Because the ip I find when i do : Start > Run > CMD > IPCONFIG is a non-helpful 86.7.(etc..) and When I pasted that in my address bar in IE(internet explorer) I just get a blank-error page. So please explain in detail how to find this--All the way to the Server being editable (I can do it from there)

item.title: Help: Need detailed explanation of how to start a server
item.dc:creator: @ownage2 ownage?
item.description:
@ownage2 wrote:

please read and follow the rules before you start to post again,
if you do not know where to find these rules then please click on this link

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

do not post about how to make a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Help: Need detailed explanation of how to start a server
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

Ummm. Ok you cant visit your IP address in a web browser. It will bring up and error page… Type your IP address into the client your using
